flawed_nl_solution:
Peter needs $5000 - $2900 = $<<5000-2900=21000>>21000 in total.
He will have to wait for $21000 / $700/month = <<21000/700=30>>30 months to reach his goal.
#### 30

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2100, not 21000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
